title: Laura Bush
summary: Laura Lane Welch Bush (n√©e Welch; born November 4, 1946) is an American teacher, librarian, memoirist and author who was the first lady of the United States from 2001 to 2009.[1][2][3] Bush previously served as the first lady of Texas from 1995 to 2000. She is the wife of former President George W. Bush.
